DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare intubation time effectiveness , grade larynx visibility , ease intubation adult perform nurse use 4 device : Macintosh blade laryngoscope ( MAC ) , TruView EVO2 ( EVO2 ) , TruView EVO2 PCD ( PCD ) , ETView SL ( ETView ) laryngoscope , simulate CPR setting without CC .
